snippet.title: Wildfrost Mobile - OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Available Now on Google Play Store for Android devices!
📱 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DeadpanGames.Wildfrost

**This app is 'try before you buy' - players have the option to purchase the full game once the demo has been completed**

The sun has frozen over. The world has succumbed to the Wildfrost. Now only the town of Snowdwell and its survivors stand as the last bastion against an eternal winter… Build up a deck of powerful card companions and elemental items, as you battle to banish the frost once and for all!

Developed by Deadpan Games & Gaziter. Published by Chucklefish.

Learn more: http://wildfrostgame.com
Join the Discord: http://discord.gg/wildfrost
Follow Wildfrost on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WildfrostGame
Follow Chucklefish on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChucklefishLTD
